caption: Two people are watching TV in a room. Then the scene shifted to a group of people standing in the room, and they all take their seats shortly afterwards. Then, they start talking to each other. Afterward, they all leave their seats. And then the scene shifts to a prison. Prison guards are busy at work. A muscular man sits in his prison cell under a lamp. He was originally shirtless but puts on a coat. He starts punching wildly in the air. Daylight arrives, and a few people are taking a group photo outdoors. Two people are on the phone.

global.question: Does it happen during day or night?
Are there more then three different backgrounds appearing in the video?
Do more than 5 people appear in the video?
When does it happens in the video, ancient age, modern age or future?

breakpoint.question: Is the person a man or a woman?
